marklogic.body: I have had numerous incidents where someone has nearly run me the road, coming into my lane right BESIDE me, when I should be past the blind Spot mark. We have the most ignorant, unapologetic and yes-mentally retarded drivers I have ever seen in a city. I now just assume everyone who is driving around me is not beyond cutting me Off or driving themselves into a brick wall. Â Also, I agree with the others on the left lane. If you are going slower, stay out of it! I notice in busy times there'll be a car going 59 in a 60 zone in the left lane with a huge group stuck behind him/her which actually just makes our morning traffic worse. And I 100% agree with the yellowhead issue, huge trucks in all 3 lanes makes it more dangerous for everyone else.
